documentation.text:
@notice Minimal BentoBox vault interface.
 @dev `token` is aliased as `address` from `IERC20` for simplicity.
@notice Registers contract so that users can approve it for BentoBox.
@notice Provides way for users to sign approval for BentoBox spends.

@notice Bilateral escrow for ETH and ERC-20/721 tokens with BentoBox integration.
 @author LexDAO LLC.
@dev Chain Id at this contract's deployment.
@dev EIP-712 typehash for this contract's domain at deployment.
@dev Events to assist web3 applications.
@dev Ensures registered resolver cooldown.
@dev Reentrancy guard.
@notice EIP-712 typehash for this contract's domain.

@notice Returns escrow milestone deposits per `value` array.
 @param registration The index of escrow deposit.
@param registration The index of escrow deposit.

@notice Protocol for LexDAO to update role.
 @param lexDAO_ Account to assign role to.
@notice Enables calling multiple methods in a single call to this contract.

devdoc.details: `token` is aliased as `address` from `IERC20` for simplicity.

params.amount: Token amount in native representation to deposit.
params.from: which account to pull the tokens.
params.share: Token amount represented in shares to deposit. Takes precedence over `amount`.
params.to: which account to push the tokens.

returns.shareOut: The deposited amount represented in shares.

params.from: which user to pull the tokens.
params.to: which user to push the tokens.

deposit(address,address,address,uint256,.notice: Deposit an amount of `token` represented in either `amount` or `share`.

registerProtocol().notice: Registers contract so that users can approve it for BentoBox.

setMasterContractApproval(address,addres.notice: Provides way for users to sign approval for BentoBox spends.

transfer(address,address,address,uint256.notice: Transfer shares from a user account to another one.
